wikipedia_page.main:
Major-General Joseph Porter Crowdy  FRIPH (19 November 1923 – 28 June 2009) was a British soldier and military doctor, and Commandant of the Royal Army Medical College.
He was an Honorary Physician to H. M. the Queen, 1981–1984.

response: *Major-General Joseph Crowdy – Commandant of the Royal Army Medical Corps
*Joseph Crowdy CB (born 19 November 1923) is a retired English soldier and military doctor, a former Commandant of the Royal Army Medical College
*Joseph Crowdy, 85, British soldier, Commandant of the Royal Army Medical Corps.
